description: Speakers constantly interrupt each other with incomplete sentences. One event emerges: presentation rehearsal Thursday 4-5:30 PM.

events.title: Presentation Rehearsal
events.reasoning: Despite constant interruptions, Alice and Bob agree on a presentation rehearsal on Thursday at 4 PM (shifted from initial 3 PM) for 90 minutes in the main conference room. They will also discuss the vendor contract.

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 1 event: presentation rehearsal Thursday 4-5:30 PM in the main conference room.

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'Thursday' is 2026-02-26. Time was initially 3 PM but shifted to 4 PM due to conflict. Duration explicitly stated as 90 minutes (4 to 5:30).
